content: Yes, finding the right balance between technology and traditional methods is key to ensuring the safety and effectiveness of sniper operations. While technology can certainly enhance snipers' capabilities, there are potential risks associated with relying too heavily on it. A skilled and experienced sniper with a deep understanding of traditional methods is still an essential component of any successful sniper mission. Therefore, technology should be viewed as a tool to enhance a sniper's skills and operational capability rather than a replacement for those skills. A balanced and holistic approach to training and equipping snipers will ultimately lead to the best outcomes in modern warfare.
